page.title: 19PLAYGROUND GAMES
page.content: During breaks from lessons these are some of the games played by children living in this block. {SPORTS}Football especially is popular but other games include netball and cricket. {CHASING AND CATCHING GAMES}The most popular is Bulldog where the catcher has to stand in the middle of the playground with the runners at one end. The catcher names a person who tries to run past. As soon as the named person has run, all the others start. Anyone who is caught becomes a catcher. In order to be catch someone they have to be held, sometimes off the ground, while the catcher says, "British Bulldog 1,2,3". Various sorts of tag are popular at different times including Off Ground He, Sticky Toffee, Buzz, and Drain He which uses drain covers as home.
